termination.translation[0].definitions[0: the act of ending something, or the end of something
You may face a reduction or termination of benefits.
termination.translation[0].definitions[1: a medical operation to end the life of a developing child before it is born
termination.translation[1].definitions[0: the act of ending something, or the end of something
No reason was given for the termination of the discussions.
